title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 12 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 12 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Trump's unique tale on New Hampshire primary. Rush predicted on Day One, Biden wouldn't make it. Never Trumpers were secretly working for Biden. Biden's loyalty to Obama was worth nothing. Biden failure means black vote up for grabs for Trump. Rush's prediction on Mayor Pete. Who do Dems want to lose with? Millionaire Warren takes $3 donation from student who says she only has $6 in the bank. Trump smashes record for incumbent primary turnout. Drive-Bys say Klobuchar has "Klobmentum", sounds like constipation drug. Bernie tomahawked Fauxcahontas in the back.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Roger Stone case was outrageous, never should have been brought. Barr and Durham are moving. Mueller team knew there was no Russia collusion, but they manufactured process crime against Roger Stone anyway. Four Mueller prosecutors quit over Stone sentencing. Are DOJ lawyers trying to entrap Trump to restart impeachment hearings. Gloria Borger: Barr is Trump's Roy Cohn. CNN's Manu Raju trying to gin up impeachment again. Will Dems resign themselves to sacrifice Crazy Bernie? Holder said he was Obama's wingman.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush touched by outpouring of love. Van Jones: Democrats are depressed, waiting for a nominee to come out and vote for against Trump. Mark Penn: If Biden doesn’t come back, Trump will take black votes from the Democrats. Insanity at CNN, MSNBC, Deep State after they failed to take out Trump. Trump’s budget and Democrat socialism. Medicare for all won’t be for all, because people who can afford it will always buy the best health care. Bloomberg doesn’t have a prayer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
